popularityCurve.label: for me the richness of a country the power of a people is to be measured by the quantity and quality of its intellectual development revolution is a useful enterprise only if it favors such development scholars should be treated with care and respect but in trying to save our own skins we are decapitating the people destroying our own brain

clusterList.phrase: for me the richness of a country the power of a people is to be measured by the quantity and quality of its intellectual development revolution is a useful enterprise only if it favors such development scholars should be treated with care and respect but in trying to save our own skins we are decapitating the people destroying our own brain

we would be wrong to equate the intellectual strength of the people with the strength of the bourgeois intelligentsia the intellectual strength of workers and peasants grows in the struggle to overturn the bourgeoisie and their acolytes those second-rate intellectuals and lackeys of capitalism who think they are the brain of the nation they are not the brain of the nation they're shit
approach found even among the political elite the mentality of borrowing our way to prosperity and the optimism of innovators who want to do what's right which attitudes prevails in your community
are the rich necessary great economic arguments and how they reflect our personal values
the source not only of power and wealth but also of a nation's identity and culture
